issue.title: [C++][Parquet] Fix building error "cannot bind lvalue"
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7791](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7791). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When running the commads:

```

cmake -DARROW_BUILD_TESTS=ON ..
make

```

with following error:

arrow/cpp/src/parquet/arrow/arrow_reader_writer_test.cc:2900:12: error: cannot bind 'std::unique_ptr<parquet::arrow::FileReader>' lvalue to 'std::unique_ptr<parquet::arrow::FileReader>&&'

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7791?focusedCommentId=17033109) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6381
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6381>
